item.title: Retrospective on 2022 and Resolution for 2023
item.description: Here we go, again. Here I am making a list of good resolutions for 2023. Wait, let’s take a step back. First let’s try to do a retrospective of my 2022 and the goals I set for myself. Wait wait, let’s take another step back, let’s go back to the situation I was in when I set those goals. A year ago I was about to finish my studies at the cyberhackdemy, a cybersecurity academy I was selected for in May 2021.
